entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023
